about_the_game:
• This game is only available in Japanese.

Connect Collect is a card game in which you increase the number of friends you fight with.
In between battles, the story progresses like a picture-story show.

At first, you don't even know the names of your friends, what abilities they have, or what their backgrounds are.
After meeting compatible companions and helping each other, you finally learn their abilities and names.

Connect Collect is a story about knowing names.

The story takes place in the real world of 2012.

As a doomed planet approaches Earth from the edge of the universe, people learn of a special entity called a lamp.

Floating lamp.
It changes its shape under the guidance of its wielder and activates its magical abilities.

The power of destruction, the power of healing to heal wounds, the power of brilliance to light up the dark night or the power of killing people to take away their warmth.......

Each and every lamp has a different ability.

The story of a boy and a girl begins in rural Japan.
The goal of the adventure is to find the ability to save the earth, somewhere in the world.

About the game system

It is a turn-based card battle. The opponents you defeat will become your friends.
But it is not clear at first what kind of ability they have.

You will have to fight by guessing and groping, using the predicted damage display as a hint.

After fighting together for a while, you can get to know your companions,
The effects will change into clear text.

It is a card game, but no deck editing is required.

There is no mana management, no sacrifices, no removal, and the theories you have should not come through. Understanding the minds of your fellow players and strengthening your forces is what makes Konekore Battle unique.

A single card has three roles.

  • Summon it as a battle character and fight one-on-one with your opponent.

  • When a Battle Character is already on the battlefield, it activates its support ability.

  • When a Battle Character is already on the field, it is used to select an attack option.

Which card from the hand is nominated as the Battle Character?
Which card from the remaining hand is to be activated as a Support Ability,
What kind of attack options are available for the remaining cards in your hand. ......

Create massive damage and win the battle by combining the cards well.
